events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to request a refund because the item isn't what I expected and I no longer need it.
The customer's request for a refund has been noted and the case is categorized under Refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order in question.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, may I also confirm the reason for the return and whether the item has been used or opened?
Sure, my order number is 12345ABC, and the item is unopened. I want to return it because it does not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the details. Iâ€™ve initiated the refund process. You will receive an email with return instructions and your money back once we receive the item.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the clear instructions and look forward to completing the return.
The refund case has been resolved with instructions sent to the customer. Awaiting the returned shipment for final processing.
Just checking in to confirm if you have been able to send the return package and if you need any further assistance with the refund.
Yes, I dropped off the package yesterday. Thanks for following up, everything looks good so far.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Please reach out if you have any further questions.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
